text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
The judges have ruled that first-place<n>finisher Mejiro
McQueen illegally<n>obstructed other Umamusume during<n>
the race.

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Her placement will be adjusted to<n>eighteenth.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The race unfolded with a great start<n>for Mejiro McQueen.
She navigated to<n>the inner track in an attempt to find a<n>
good position.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Unfortunately, this hampered the<n>movement of the runners
behind her,<n>resulting in a situation where many<n>were in
danger of falling.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
As this was caused by the race's<n>favorite to win, the public
reaction was<n>significant.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ryan
text_block_list.text: McQueen, are you okay?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh, yes, of course.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can't deny that my actions posed a<n>risk to other
competitors, betraying the<n>high expectations placed upon
me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I simply need to move on and<n>improve myself.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I'll put this failure of a race behind me<n>by succeeding in the
next.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Dober
text_block_list.text:
Just don't be so hard on yourself,<n>okay? We can plainly
see that you've<n>reflected well enough on this.

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: That's right! I'll be looking forward to<n>your next race!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Fight on, McQueen!
choice_data_list: Let's treat this as a learning experience.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes, I plan to do so.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Yo, anyone miss me?

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
There were a bunch of creeps with<n>cameras out there so I
screamed,<n>"Look, a buncha creeps!"

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Those were no doubt reporters.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I can only imagine that they were just<n>waiting for a chance
to catch me.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Well, don't sweat it. They weren't<n>supposed to be in the
academy<n>anyway, so they really were creeps.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
The last of them should be gone soon<n>enough. Let's hold
off on any actual<n>training today, though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It's not as if I am particularly<n>bothered by the idea of
answering<n>their questions. I would do so with full<n>honesty.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
And at some point, I will need to<n>speak with them about my
plans to<n>win my next race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I'm in the mood to move my body.<n>Let's go, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: ...All right.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: ...All right.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
The dorm is just over there. I don't<n>think you need to
accompany me any<n>longer.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
I don't want you to get caught up<n>alone with a bunch of
rabid reporters.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Like I said, I do not mind answering<n>their questions.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Ah, McQueen! May I get your<n>comments in regards to the
autumn<n>Tenno Sho?

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text: Why did you choose to run in such a<n>dangerous manner?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I apologize for causing such dire<n>inconvenience toward all of
those<n>involved with the race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This incident was the result of my<n>own foolish inexperience.
I can make<n>no excuses.

text_block_list.name: Reporter A
text_block_list.text:
Have you spoken to the runners who<n>were caught up
behind you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I paid each of them a visit to<n>apologize personally.

text_block_list.name: Reporter B
text_block_list.text:
Was it your trainer who instructed<n>you to force your way to
the inside?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Instructions from my trainer? We<n>discussed nothing of the
sort!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That was entirely the result of my<n>own judgment. My
trainer has nothing<n>to do with this incident!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Despite keeping her cool thus far,<n>McQueen grows
indignant when faced<n>with this question.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I know she wants to answer their<n>questions with honesty,
and I intended<n>to let her do so if it would help her<n>sort out
her own emotions.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
However, the sight of her trying to<n>shoulder all of the
responsibility on her<n>own is too much for me to bear.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
However, the sight of her trying to<n>shoulder all of the
responsibility on her<n>own is too much for me to bear.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
But if I leave now, they'll assume<n>that this was your fault
somehow!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Regardless of whose judgment call it<n>was, as her trainer, I
take full<n>responsibility for what happened. My<n>deepest
apologies.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Trainer!

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Come on, let's get going.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Don't let it bother you, McQueen. You<n>were simply running
your heart out.<n>There is nothing to blame on you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
Don't let it bother you, McQueen. You<n>were simply running
your heart out.<n>There is nothing to blame on you.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You said you were going to put this<n>behind you, right? Let's
put all of our<n>energy towards the next race.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
You said you were going to put this<n>behind you, right? Let's
put all of our<n>energy towards the next race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Understood.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: But um... Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I've decided that I want to run in the<n>Japan Cup before the
Arima Kinen.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
That's so soon, though. Surely<n>you're still tired from the
race you<n>just ran...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No, I'm perfectly fine. I'm ready to<n>give it my full power.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Please allow me to enter the Japan<n>Cup.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I imagine that she hopes to put this<n>incident away as quickly
as possible.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Not only that, but she likely means it<n>as a way to redeem
herself in the<n>eyes of fans and those she troubled.
choice_data_list: All right. Our next race will be the Japan Cup.
All right. Our next race will be the Japan Cup.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I am absolutely...<n>absolutely going to win.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Wooooooo!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: McQueen is struggling to keep up.<n>The gap is widening!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text: Today's favorite, Mejiro McQueen,<n>places fourth!
